title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Autoethnographic Design Framework for Decolonial Psychology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three cultural biases embedded in psychology education design through autoethnographic reflection.
Learners can develop at least one educational module by applying a learning activity design framework based on decolonial principles.
Learners can submit educational design improvement plans incorporating peer assessment feedback using collaboration tools in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
